name: Until the Fog Dissipates (Demo)
description:
Video Presentation:

https://stream.liv.ac.uk/4egk4qzd

What is this game about

You will play as a young man whose uncle, who was a lighthouse keeper, disappeared from the island he worked several years ago. In order to find out the truth, he becomes a lighthouse keeper and sets out on that island, accidentally, he found the terminal his uncle had been used before…

How to play this game:

You can explore the terminal, or freely chat with your workmates, who are also the ex-workmates of your uncle, to find the trails of your uncle, but mind your word of use, it may influence their attitudes to you. Once you think you find the truth, you can submit your answers.

Controls:

Mouse and keyboard are the main ways to interact with the game. You can check documents, do reasoning and set configurations through mouse clicking. Besides, use the keyboard to type in the chat interface, and press Enter to send your message to get a reply from NPC. 

System Requirements:

Operating system: Windows 10

RAM: > 2 GB

Graphics card: > 512 MB Memory

Disk Space: > 500 MB
